capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability

skills.name: Staff Supervision
skills.description: Overseeing housekeeping staff and ensuring tasks are completed efficiently.

skills.name: Safety Compliance

skills.name: Customer Service

generalRole.title: Hospitality and Facilities Management Leader
generalRole.description: This role involves leading a team in maintaining cleanliness and hygiene standards in a hospitality setting, ensuring compliance with safety regulations, and providing excellent customer service. It requires a blend of administrative support and field operations skills, with a focus on people management, results delivery, and effective communication.
